id.title: An id for the activity. Always in “::” format. Can be sent as page_token in requests to facilitate the paging of results.

cum_qty.title: The cumulative quantity of shares involved in the execution.

leaves_qty.title: For partially_filled orders, the quantity of shares that are left to be filled.

price.title: The per-share price that the trade was executed at.

qty.title: The number of shares involved in the trade execution.

symbol.title: The symbol of the security being traded.

transaction_time.title: The time at which the execution occurred.

order_id.title: The id for the order that filled. Always in GUID format.
